text:
Fans Point Out That Jaime Lannister Is Wearing Robb Stark's Armour In New Pictures & We're Shook
Fans Point Out That Jaime Lannister Is Wearing Robb Stark's Armour In New Pictures & We're Shook
Winter is almost here, and looks like it’s going to be a long one. The episodes of Game Of Thrones season 8 will be longer than the last seasons, the makers have already revealed. Yesterday, HBO released a big bunch of new pictures from the finale season to whet the appetite of the fans.
Also Read: 9 Insanely Convincing ‘Game Of Thrones’ Season 8 Theories That Will Pump You Up For The Finale!
The pictures gave a glimpse of all the characters of the show, and curious fans found something weird in that too. In Jaime Lannister’s pictures, ardent Game of Thrones fans noticed the similarity of his armour with that of Robb Stark’s armour. Robb Stark had died in season 3, so what does this hint?
Fans couldn’t stop speculating.
Is it just me or is Jaime's armour very reminiscent of Robb Starks, particularly the breastplate & pauldrons. And I like how he's no longer in lavish Lannister armour, he's dressed for a real, gritty battle and I'm loving it! #GameOfThrones pic.twitter.com/hdfBWlj0mT — chillyravenart (@chillyravenart) February 6, 2019
He's another 'dishonoured' knight, (like Jorah & the Hound) who's been given a chance at redemption & to fight for the living. And if he has to die, I hope he goes out gloriously, I hope singers sing about him for a thousand years to come 💔 pic.twitter.com/gZFSgOxMj5 — chillyravenart (@chillyravenart) February 7, 2019
Don't Miss 161 SHARES 842 SHARES
they really gave jaime robb’s armour pic.twitter.com/KBEZ8qg682 — 𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐬 (@IetaIestrnge) February 7, 2019
Jaime >>>>>>>> Robb — Kevin (@Noble_KB) February 6, 2019
In the last season, we saw Jaime Lannister going to the north join to Jon Snow and Daenerys Targaryen in the war against White Walkers leaving behind his sister Cersei Lannister.
Also Read: This Game Of Thrones Season 8 Theory About Jaime Lannister Is The Only Ray Of Hope For His Survival!
title: Jaime Lannister:Is Jaime Lannister Wearing Robb Stark’s Armour? Game Of Thrones Fans Are Shocked After Seeing New Pics
